select count(*) from notice

where emp_name like '%'||#{user_id}||'%'

select * from (select rownum rnum, notice_no, emp_name, notice_title, original_filepath, rename_filepath, notice_date, notice_check, notice_content from (select * from notice
where notice_title like '%'||#{stitle}||'%'
where emp_name like '%'||#{user_id}||'%'
order by notice_date desc))
where rnum >= #{startList} and rnum <= #{endList}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_check = notice_check + 1 where notice_no = #{notice_no}

update notice set emp_name = #{emp_name}, notice_title = #{notice_title}, original_filepath = #{original_filepath}, rename_filepath = #{rename_filepath}, notice_date = sysdate, notice_check = 0, notice_content = #{notice_content} where notice_no = #{notice_no}
